name: Vroom Vroom Plane
description:
Dev Team 

Quang Nhat Le

Andrew Wagstaffe

Zihui Lu

Jia Xin Pang

Yu Cheng

Instructions

Kill Enemies to draw out the Boss, and kill the Boss to win the GAME

Rush in to fight your way to victory!

Or

Be an Assassin, hide in the cloud to sneak on your enemies

Keys

Arrow Keys -- Move

Space -- Shoot

R -- reset the game when the player is alive
